response.overview: Japanese Blu-ray from TOHO Visual Entertainment  TOHO Visual Entertainment will finally be releasing the five Fes Godzilla shorts to Blu-ray in one collection. Several of them were previously only available on disc as a reward for those who gave to the crowdfunding campaigns. In addition to the shorts, the release will also contain making-of footage, and interviews with director Kazuhiro Nakagawa and Godzilla suit actor Naoya Matsumoto.  The disc will not be subtitled in English, nor is there currently any word of a release outside Japan. Included shorts: -"Godzilla: Godzilla Fes" -"Godzilla vs. Hedorah" -“Fes Godzilla 3: Gigan Attacks" -"Fes Godzilla 4: Operation Jet Jaguar" -"Fes Godzilla 5: Great Monster Battle" Retail price: ¥6,050 (Japan tax included), ¥5500 (without) TBR35031D JAN/ISBN: 4988104141316 1 Disc 1 layer (BD25G) 16:9 widescreen 1080p High Definition Audio: Japanese 2.0ch Linear PCM Subtitles: None
response.title: Fes Godzilla' Shorts 2025
